message.content:
cs.DB, cs.CR, cs.SE, cs.PL, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with access control policies for XML data, which is commonly used in database systems. Therefore, cs.DB is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses security flaws and repairing inconsistencies, which falls under the scope of cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) and cs.SE (Software Engineering). The paper proposes algorithms and heuristics for repairing inconsistencies, which is related to cs.PL (Programming Languages) and cs.LG (Machine Learning).
